§TOOLS[

§TEXTFIELDS[
§Exporting a Documentation Project
§45
]TEXTFIELDS§
§TAGS[
§Exporting a project; to export a project; export function; export html; print manual
]TAGS§
§ANNODRAFT[
§
]ANNODRAFT§
§ANNOFINAL[
§<html dir="ltr"><head></head><body contenteditable="true"><h3><font face="Segoe UI" size="4">To export a Project:&nbsp;</font></h3><p></p><ul><li><font face="Segoe UI">[Frame 2] Click on <i>File-&gt;Export&nbsp;</i><b>(1)&nbsp;</b></font><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">[Frame 1]&nbsp;</span></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">[Frame 2] Select the Parent Directory <b>(2)</b>&nbsp;</font><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">[Frame 2]<br>In this example, the directory of the ManuMaker Project is chosen</span></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">[Frame 2] Click Select Folder <b>(3)</b>&nbsp;to export the project.&nbsp;</font></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">The Exported documentation will be saved in a folder in the selected parent directory.&nbsp;</font></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">[Frame 2] The folder name consists of the Project Title as set in the Project settings, appended by "Printable_HTML" <b>(4) </b>.&nbsp;</font></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">This folder is portable, since it contains all information needed for the HTML-based manual (Images, Logo, etc. are copied into the Printable_HTML folder)</font></li></ul>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</body></html>&nbsp;&nbsp;
]ANNOFINAL§
